name: NSSearchFieldCell
desc: The programmatic interface for text fields that are used for text-based searches.

items.name: var searchButtonCell: NSButtonCell?
items.desc: The button cell used to display the search-button image.

items.name: func resetSearchButtonCell()
items.desc: Resets the search button cell to its default attributes.

items.name: var cancelButtonCell: NSButtonCell?
items.desc: The button cell used to display the cancel-button image.

items.name: func resetCancelButtonCell()
items.desc: Resets the cancel button cell to its default attributes.

items.name: func searchTextRect(forBounds: NSRect) -> NSRect
items.desc: Modifies the bounding rectangle for the search-text field cell.

items.name: func searchButtonRect(forBounds: NSRect) -> NSRect
items.desc: Modifies the bounding rectangle for the search button cell.

items.name: func cancelButtonRect(forBounds: NSRect) -> NSRect
items.desc: Modifies the bounding rectangle for the cancel button cell.

items.name: var searchMenuTemplate: NSMenu?
items.desc: The menu object used to dynamically construct the search fieldâ€™s pop-up icon menu.

items.name: var sendsWholeSearchString: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the cell calls its search action method when the user clicks the search button (or presses Return) or after each keystroke.

items.name: var sendsSearchStringImmediately: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the cell calls its action method immediately when an appropriate action occurs.

items.name: var maximumRecents: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of search strings that can appear in the search menu.

items.name: var recentSearches: [String]!
items.desc: An array of the recent search strings to display in the pop-up icon menu of the search field.

items.name: var recentsAutosaveName: NSSearchField.RecentsAutosaveName?
items.desc: The autosave name under which the search field automatically saves the list of recent search strings.
